He went to live in seclusion at Yanshan.
Prime Minister Lengmili Buhua.
He forcibly assumed the position of lord of Tianning.
He was given the title of Chan Master Fochi and Puhui.
He was also given a gold full-length robe.
The teacher's demeanor was as solemn as autumn.
He had once set up a room at Zhongfeng to live in.
He kept a crane.
He called himself Master Crane and Pine.
One day, the crane suddenly died.
Shifu offered a poem in tribute.
A few years later, he also passed away.
Chan Master Yushan Zhen's Dharma Succession

source_sentence: 江寧府蔣山曇芳忠禪師南康人。
translation: He was a native of Nankang, the Chan Master Tanfang Zhong of Jiangning Prefecture's Jiangshan Mountain.
He was admitted to the temple at the time of its opening.
The following day, the king of Liang climbed a mountain.
He said to the master.
"What will happen to him?
The master said.
'I'm counting on the presence of the great patron.'
The king said.
'The temple has been destroyed.
Where will the Buddha live?
The teacher said.
"The Buddha of old passed away.
Now the Buddha has come again.
The monastery owner was overjoyed.
He smiled again and said.

source_sentence: 衲子所謂蔣薄粥者何也。
translation: "What did the monk call Jiang's thin gruel?
The master said.
He said, 'Your Highness has forgotten about it.'

source_sentence: 後王賜號廣慧圓悟大師。
translation: The later king gave his name to the great teacher Guanghui Yuanwu.
Xuedeng zhengtong vol. 24
